text:
Hey Everyone!
Has anyone found a way on how to utilise this Chatspotintegration in a workflow?
Is there a way on how i can use this via API?

(I want to gather data based on company domain and when a new contact is created and the company doesnt exist in HubSpot -> create a new company)
Is there a better/easier way then using ChatSpot/ another programm/ just plain code to use?
I am open for any suggestions/ideas doesnt matter how complicated it might seem! :slightly_smiling_face:
